entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 16 at 3:16PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Freezing Rain Possible Thursday Into Friday... Areas of freezing rain are possible across the West Coast and Western Interior of Alaska Thursday into Friday.
